meanings.definition: A smaller group within a larger group.
meanings.sent1: In our class, the reading subgroup meets every Friday to discuss books.
meanings.sent2: The math subgroup consists of students who excel in solving equations.
meanings.sent3: The subgroup of friends who love hiking always brings the best snacks on our trips.
meanings.sent4: Just like a puzzle piece, each subgroup fits perfectly into the bigger picture of our community.
meanings.sent5: The subgroup of talented musicians added a beautiful harmony to the choir performance.

meanings.definition: A group that is a part of a larger group.
meanings.sent1: The science subgroup focuses on experiments related to chemistry and biology.
meanings.sent2: Every department in the company has a subgroup dedicated to improving efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The subgroup of movie enthusiasts always has the best recommendations for weekend movie nights.
meanings.sent4: Each subgroup in the ecosystem plays a crucial role in maintaining the balance of nature.
meanings.sent5: The subgroup of volunteers worked tirelessly to organize the charity event.
